articles.title: Alcaraz Beats Coric, Reaches Madrid Final - ATP Tour
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz celebrated his 20th birthday with another relentless performance on Friday at the Mutua Madrid Open, where he overcame stiff resistance from Borna Coric to seal semi-final victory at the clay-court ATP Masters 1000.
articles.content:
Twenty consecutive ATP Tour wins on Spanish soil for the 20-year-old Carlos Alcaraz.
